LanguageData.PlantAgave.label: agave
LanguageData.PlantAgave.description: A large-leafed desert plant with edible flowers and stalks。
LanguageData.PlantRaspberry.label: raspberry bush
LanguageData.PlantRaspberry.description: Raspberry bushes are plants that produce fragile, red, bumpy fruits called raspberries。
LanguageData.PlantStrawberry.label: strawberry plant
LanguageData.PlantStrawberry.description: Strawberry plants produce small, tasty red fruits called strawberries. These fruits are delicious even when raw。
LanguageData.Plantblueberry.label: blueberry bush
LanguageData.Plantblueberry.description: Blueberry bushes produce tiny, round, blue colored fruits called blueberries. Blueberries are tasty when eaten raw。
LanguageData.Plantcloudberry.label: cloudberry bush
LanguageData.Plantcloudberry.description: Cloudberry bushes produce sweet, amber-coloured, raspberry-shaped fruits called cloudberries. Cloudberry bushes are capable of growing well in cold climates。
LanguageData.Plantgooseberry.label: gooseberry bush
LanguageData.Plantgooseberry.description: Gooseberry bush produce small, sweet, somewhat hairy fruits called Gooseberries. Gooseberry bushes can grow in cold climates。
LanguageData.Plantcocoa.label: Cocoa Tree
LanguageData.Plantcocoa.description: Cocoa Trees produce seeds in pods that are called Cocoa Beans. Cocoa Beans can be refined into chocolate。
LanguageData.PlantAppletree.label: Apple Tree
LanguageData.PlantAppletree.description: Apple Trees produce round, palm-sized, red fruits called Apples. The Apple Tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of Apple production。
LanguageData.PlantBananaTree.label: Banana Tree
LanguageData.PlantBananaTree.description: Banana Trees produce long, yellow fruits called Bananas, which eventually soften into a sweet delight. The Banana Tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of Banana production。
LanguageData.PlantorangeTree.label: Orange Tree
LanguageData.PlantorangeTree.description: Orange Trees produce sweet, citric fruits called Oranges. The Orange Tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of Orange production。
LanguageData.PlantPeachTree.label: peach tree
LanguageData.PlantPeachTree.description: Peach trees produce soft, fuzzy, sweet fruits called peaches. The peach tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of peach production。
LanguageData.Plantgrape.label: grape vine
LanguageData.Plantgrape.description: Grape vines produce small, sweet berries that grow in clusters on a single branch. These fruits are called grapes。
